pages.text:
About Us
admin
2023-02-25T11:25:33-05:00
Welcome!
When you visit Holy Sacrament for worship you will feel at home here.
Our Church welcomes persons of all ages to attend our worship services, receive communion,
and to participate in the life of the church.
Should you have any questions or would like to know more about our church
or the wider community of which we are a part,
please contact our Office at 954.432.8686 or
click here
to email us.
Vision Statement
"Holy Sacrament Episcopal Church will faithfully serve each other,
respect and delight in our diverse gifts and
faithfully carry the light and love of Jesus Christ
to all people at home and abroad wherever our Lord shall lead."
Mission Statement
Our mission is about "Transforming lives through Christ using our diverse gifts."

Contact 2018

.wpforms-container
The church is located on the north west side of University Drive and Sheridan Street, in front of Davie Extension Road. The church campus is situated immediately north and east of the Monterra Community.
A large parking lot is on the church campus and is positioned on the east, south and west of the church building. During the week (Monday to Friday) it is used by the Memorial Pembroke Hospital, which is located across the street (south east side of University Drive and Sheridan Street).
We are also easily accessible by public transportation.
